TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract BitmapDecoder extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public MustInherit Class BitmapDecoder Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 代表點陣圖框架的容器。

span.span: Represents a container for bitmap frames.

summary.span: 每個點陣圖框架都是 。

span.span: Each bitmap frame is a .

summary.span: 這個抽象類別提供所有衍生解碼器物件的一組基本功能。

span.span: This abstract class provides a base set of functionality for all derived decoder objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是本身; 相反地，它是容器物件。 is not a itself; rather, it is a container for objects. 每個容器中可能有不同的屬性，其中包含不同大小、 解析度或調色盤。Each in the container can potentially have different attributes, including different sizes, resolutions, or palettes. 選取特定的轉碼器時，除非[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]自動執行階段探索用以識別影像的格式，並使其符合適當的轉碼器。Unless a specific codec is selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses automatic run-time discovery to identify the format of an image and match it with the appropriate codec. 此探索程序可讓所開發的轉碼器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isv](~/includes/tlasharptla-isv-md.md)]為可由系統自動探索。This discovery process allows a codec developed by an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isv](~/includes/tlasharptla-isv-md.md)] to be automatically discoverable by the system. 若要選取特定的轉碼器，衍生或，例如類別中，應該使用。To select a specific codec, the derived or , such as the class, should be used. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]只會實作支援多個畫面格的影像格式。and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] are the only implemented image formats that support multiple frames. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法用來建立指定之影像的解碼器。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a decoder for a given image. 第一個映像做為來源的控制項。The first of the image is used as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapDecoderExample.cs#bitmapdecodercreate)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapDecoderExample.vb#bitmapdecodercreate)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用內建來開啟並加以解碼[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]點陣圖。The following code example demonstrates how to use the built in to open and decode a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap. 產生做為的項目。The resulting is used as the of an element. [!code-csharp[bitmapframeexample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#4)] [!code-vb[bitmapframeexample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用快取選項，如果您想要關閉`bitmapStream`建立解碼器之後。Use the cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created. 預設值快取選項保留資料流的存取權，直到所需的點陣圖，以及清除作業由記憶體回收行程。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法用來建立指定之影像的解碼器。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a decoder for a given image. 第一個映像做為來源的控制項。The first of the image is used as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreateStream](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapDecoderExample.cs#bitmapdecodercreatestream)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreateStream](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapDecoderExample.vb#bitmapdecodercreatestream)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋出資源並執行其他清除作業後，記憶體回收才能重新回收 。

span.span: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫 。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非呼叫已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Finalize 方法和解構函式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

permission.span: 用於存取 unmanaged 資源。

span.span: for access to unmanaged resources.
Security action:.

summary.span: 如果未定義，則取得表示點陣圖縮圖的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何原生格式支援通用的縮圖。None of the native formats support global thumbnails. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]，並[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)]支援，可以使用存取範圍層級縮圖屬性。, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] support frame-level thumbnails that can be accessed using the property. 傳回由這個屬性已凍結。The returned by this property is frozen.
